description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study - tonkean_macaque/ brown_capuchin/bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical

Variable referring to the type of reward constellation they gamble for. There were 18 lotteries. Each lotterie is composed of 6 cups with different reward quantities. Each lotterie thus differs in the probability to win a reward and the expected value of the reward
Variable referring to whether they exchanged their initial reward on a given trial to gamble and received the content of one of the six cups
Variable referring to the volume of the expected reward multiplied by the chances of obtaining the rewards. See explanation in Table 1 of the publication

Variable referring to whether they are losing or winning over the previous trial. -1 refers to instances in which they exchanged the medium reward at the previous trial and obtained a smaller reward. 0 refers to instances in which they exchanged the medium reward at the previous trial and obtained the same, or they did not exchange rewards and kept the same reward. +1 refers to instances in which they exchanged the medium reward at the previous trial and obtained a larger reward
Variable referring to the cumulative sum of rewards obtained over trials
